img_text: NGL Austin Rhodes October 30 at 5:44 PM Kids across the street are selling Kool-Aid for $2.50 a cup (small) so I asked them what they were raising SSS for.. no lie, their response was "we are raising money to help Trump build the WALL!!!" Aaaaaaaaaaand i freakin LOST IT @簩 I also bought 2 cups!!!勿与ッ券 #MAGA #BuildTheWall
